QuestData.Title: Heavy Lifting
QuestData.Description:
The stronger members of the House of the Chosen tend to take a fairly specific form. No doubt you've seen the larger warriors in the house?
They are the greatest threat in their collective force. Thin them out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa warriors of the House of the Chosen.
QuestData.RewardText: I must thank you. We are no match for the Chosen when it comes to brute strength.

Objectives.Objective: House of the Chosen warriors slain
